name: Association of Organisations of Mediterranean Businesswomen
goal:
Promote equality in the economy and eliminate gender discrimination at work. Facilitate women's access to economic decision-making positions.

Promote the development of relations among Mediterranean businesswomen and women entrepreneurs and provide these with a strong networking and supporting platform.

Promote international cooperation and development by implementing gender and business projects and related reasearch activities.

Contribute to the professional development of Mediterranean businesswomen and women entrepreneurs by providing speficic training and capacity building.

Coordinate and unite the individual efforts of the member associations by promoting common activities and projects with the final objective of of strengthening these associations and helping them to overcome eventual isolation.

Exercise influence on public opinion through campaigns and other dissemination activities in order to rise awareness about the needs and benefits of economically empowering women, supporting the creation and growth of women owned businesses and facilitating women's access to economic decision-making.
interests: Business and Industry, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: 2017 Annual Work Programme of the Rights, Equality and Citizenship Programme (REC); Council of Europe Glossary on gender equality; Strategic Engagement for Gender Equality 2016-2019; Annual Report on Equality between women and men; Commission Recommendation on strengthening the principle of equal pay between men and women through transparency; Council conclusions on Women and the economy: Economic independence from the perspective of part-time work and self-employment ; ...
